snippet: After a state politician retires, goes to jail or dies, it’s time to close shop, including the campaign fund.
abstract: Editorial criticizes fact that former New York State politicians, including some that are dead, still have large campaign funds that make donations to other politicians; supports law that would require former politicians’ funds to be closed out; calls on Gov Andrew Cuomo to work on a state public financing system for elections.
lead_paragraph: After a state politician retires, goes to jail or dies, it’s time to close shop, including the campaign fund.
